item.title: CVE-2023-20848|2023-09-04T02:28:02.171Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt2713%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys_cmdq, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing valid range checking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07340433; Issue ID: ALPS07340433.
